page.title: 10T. JAMES HAULAGE-W.SLEEKBURN
page.content: The main interest of the business is haulage but in addition they also store coal, coke and salt.These items are stored in large huts with a capacity of 32 tons each. In the office two young women organise the sending of bills with the aid of computer record keeping.Mr James's son also works in the reception area looking after the transportation. There are many regulations controlling the use of lorries which must be followed before the company can gain a license.If more lorries are wanted a new license would have to be obtained.
